title: How to counter Yasuo. Pls help
body: I have a friends that mains adc and doesn't know what to do against a Yasuo. He says Yasuo is cancer and doesn't seem to find anything that can help him. He is more worried about the Mid/Late game part of Yasuo not so much the lanning phase. As a Riven main i find it easy to beat a Yasuo but he seems to find that i am baised as i don't play/main adc. Any suggestion from high elo players?

replies.body: if you're mid play annie or fizz, Fizz is better at kiting tho probs him  even swain is good
i feel like no haven't read the whole discussion, the advice isn't for me, i am well aware on how to verse him, the advice is to ADC mains

Yas is pretty much designed to anal rape ad's. 
His best bet is to either dodge any and all whirlwind, or play silver and block any and all whirlwind. 

But playing adc and complaining about yasuo is like playing nasus and complaining about renekton

Yeah, you need to focus on dodging those whirlwinds, its not too hard. I can also suggest that Darius {{champion:122}}  hard counters yasuo. Start playing darius maybe in the top lane and you can easily knock him into the ground late. 
I dont know if this helps since with blind pick you can't counter pick but when i play darius andd get put against a yasuo iit makes me a very happy person. ;)
Just tell him to git gut & L2 position.
